titles.title: To extend the temporary reduction of duty on cyclopropane-1,1-dicarboxylic acid, dimethyl ester.
To extend the temporary reduction of duty on cyclopropane-1,1-dicarboxylic acid, dimethyl ester.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 2011, the temporary reduction of duty on cyclopropane-1,1-dicarboxylic acid, dimethyl ester (CAS No. 6914-71-2).
